My Logseq Workflow

page-type

Workflow

Summary

How I get things done in Logseq

Jots

Everything starts in the journal, and most of it stays there. Well ‚Äî there are also study notes for courses, books, and videos, many of which take me more than a day to get through.

As workflows solidify and processes show themselves to be useful, they become pages. Sometimes a bit of information about a particular topic looks important enough to become its own page as well.

Keep My Public Brain in mind while taking and making notes. This is an everything graph, so I need to make sure private stuff stays private.

Plugins

My Currently Installed Logseq Plugins

List extracted from ~/.logseq/config/plugins.edn

Core Enhancements

Plugins that make it generally nicer to interact with Logseq

Copy Code

GitHub - vyleung/logseq-copy-code-plugin: a Logseq plugin to copy code from code blocks and inline code to your clipboard

Awesome Links

GitHub - yoyurec/logseq-awesome-links: ‚≠ê Favicons for external links, page icons for internal. Logseq pluign

Banners

GitHub - yoyurec/logseq-banners-plugin

Awesome Content

GitHub - yoyurec/logseq-awesome-content: üìù Enhanced content blocks (tasks, quotes, flashcards, headers, queries, diagrams, etc‚Ä¶) plugin for Logseq

Awesome Styler

GitHub - yoyurec/logseq-awesome-styler: üé® Totally customizable theme with presets: colors, backgrounds, fonts and sizes, etc‚Ä¶ Logseq plugin

Logseq Markmap

GitHub - vipzhicheng/logseq-plugin-mark-map: This is a plugin for https://github.com/logseq/logseq to provide mindmap support based on https://github.com/gera2ld/markmap.

Authoring

Plugins that simplify or enhance my writing experience

Diagrams as Code

GitHub - npgrosser/logseq-diagrams-as-code: Logseq plugin that lets you create diagrams from textual representation (aka ‚ÄòDiagrams as Code‚Äô). It supports a wide range of diagram types and languages, including Mermaid, Graphviz, PlantUML, and many more.

Markdown Table Editor

GitHub - haydenull/logseq-plugin-markdown-table: Logseq markdown table editor.

Get webpage title

GitHub - PaulKinlan/logseq-webpage-title

Link Preview

GitHub - pengx17/logseq-plugin-link-preview: Preview links in logseq

Logseq Interstitial Journal

GitHub - QWxleA/logseq-interstitial-heading-plugin: Insert an interstitial heading in your daily note

Block to Page

GitHub - hyrijk/logseq-plugin-block-to-page

Organization

GitHub - gidongkwon/logseq-plugin-tags: A logseq plugin that lets you find #tags

GitHub - TankCool/logseq-random-note: Random walk through your Logseq notes.
